name: Iron Lance
description: A hard-to-handle Lance. Has a powerful thrust. Superior Guard ability.

name: Iron Lance+
description: Uses only pure ore to improve offensive abilities. Its charge is outstanding.

name: Longhorn
description: Simple Lance made from a bundle of long bones. Strong guard and finishing move.

name: Long Tusk
description: Uses only high quality bone materials to create a simple and strong Lance.

name: Rusted Lance
description: A rusty Lance that isn't good for much as-is. But if you polish it...

name: Paladin Lance
description: Iron Lance made from high quantities of Machalite Ore. Known for its large shield.

name: Barbaroi Tusk
description: Improved Bone Lance. Treasured by the border dwelling hunters.

name: Wild Bone Lance
description: Lance made from boar materials. Fills users with vigor and offensive lust!

name: Fragrance
description: Lance modeled after a flower bud. Matches a cute exterior with a fragrant odor.

name: Lullaby Spear
description: Lance with concentrated Sleep Herb infused in its blade. Knocks foes out cold.

name: Ogre Tusk
description: Improved Bone Lance. Treasured by the border dwelling hunters.

name: Crimson Lance
description: A Lance made from a deep crimson horn. It boasts truly admirable offense.

name: Bone Claw Lance
description: More than adequate as a beginner's Lance. The white and red straps are stunning.

name: Red Tail
description: Lance made from fire wyvern materials. Its faults are covered by technology.

name: Native Spear
description: A frontier monster hunter runs a business trading in these fine Lances.

name: Vacuum Striker
description: A Spear held by a legendary female hunter that was often called "The Janitor".

name: Growling Wyvern
description: Ultimate Steel Spear. Strong enough to defend the fort against any calamity.

name: Gatling Lance
description: Made in a distant town, this Lance is the subject of envy in many workshops.

name: Naag Serpentblade
description: Poisoned Lance made from Remobras material. Made to cause pain and suffering.

name: Venom Lance
description: Large Spear made from poisonous Basarios. Injects venom into enemies.

name: Black Belt Lance
description: A Lance that recalls the blood and sweat of training, bringing fond memories.

name: Thunderspear
description: A Lance with endless thunder. "A thousand bolts to shatter nature".

name: Incessant Raven
description: A black Spear made from Yian Garuga. The tapered point will break any defense.

name: Black Lance
description: Lance that holds a dark power within. The despair within eats at its user.

name: Tiger Stinger
description: Its appearance illustrates its material's true power. Can penetrate anything.

name: Vermillion Rim
description: Vermillion-colored Lance /used only by those who have repelled a giant dragon.

name: Knight Lance
description: Made from exceptional ores, its traditional style is adored by fighting men.

name: Aqua Spear
description: Piscine adds elemental effect. Shoots pressurized water from its cutting edge.

name: Cold Icicle
description: Metallic Lance with any icy edge. Its stability ensures the most bang for your buck.

name: Hard Bone Lance
description: Lance made with superior quality bone. Widely admired for it rough exterior.

name: Worn Spear
description: A Lance worn in an unexpected manner. Maybe if it were refitted...?

name: Demon Lance
description: Golden Lance made of beautiful Rajang Horn. Its thrust releases lightning.

name: Hidden Stinger
description: Lance of the blackest night. Wielder's murderous intent soon finds release in prey.

name: SanctionedDrillLance
description: Technology used on giant drilling tools applied to weaponry. Rock-cutting time!

name: Sadalsuud
description: Water-elemental Lance born of new technology and underwater discoveries.

name: Spark Plug
description: A new blade-based Lance with a Great Thunderbugs spirit. Capable of high-volt shots.

name: Shell Claw Lance
description: As hard as the shells used to make it. It's very good at slicing into weak spots.

name: Carmine Stinger
description: Sharp, piercing, Shogun-based Lance. It's a new level of sharp Sharpness.

name: Iron Lance G
description: Using the latest improvement methods, its abilities are off the charts.

name: Ukanlos Calamity
description: This embodies the white god's first power: prayer, and the erasure of all.
